column4: i happen to have 2 wireless routers with some overlap as well as two wireless cards on my pc, would it be unheardof to to configure ubuntu to use both for parralellism and reliability?
er, name them the same thing with the same credentials on the same channel... then let networkmanager switch when it needs to
i was wondering if there was a way to send packets on both to double the throughput rate
you want to freaking bond wifi links?
